duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement partner programs strategy globally to recruit, onboard, and enable partners to drive incremental revenue for partners and the company.
Manage partner incentives to drive incremental revenue for partners and the company.
Communicate partner programs strategy, value proposition, and operations externally to partners, customers, analysts, and internally to field teams.
Manage and evolve DPN partner agreements and contracting processes, working in close coordination with legal, Deal Desk, and Sales Operations teams.
Ensure the DPN Partner Portal provides partners an easy-to-use and engaging platform to manage their practice and program participation.
Own partner program metrics and reporting to key internal stakeholders, working in collaboration with GTM Strategy and Operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
